CodeDisplayDefinition
The client is currently pregnant"Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant""Potential contraindications" = "Currently pregnant" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rubellacontraindications * Tabs: Rubella

Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Pneumococcal.2doseswithboosterdose * Tabs: Pneumococcal
Conduct a risk–benefit assessment considering the incidence of the disease, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement.Conduct a risk–benefit assessment considering the incidence of the disease, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement.Conduct a risk–benefit assessment considering the incidence of the disease, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement. Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.TBEcontraindications * Tabs: TBE
The client has moderate to severe fever"Potential contraindications" = "Moderate to severe fever""Potential contraindications" = "Moderate to severe fever" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.Rotaviruscontraindications * Tabs: Rotavirus
Consider postponing the vaccination if the client has fever > 38.5°C or other signs of serious disease. code.value: Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note
Conduct a risk–benefit assessment considering the incidence of the disease, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement.
The client has moderate to severe fever
Consider postponing the vaccination if the client has fever > 38.5°C or other signs of serious disease. Consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement.
